SELECT gi.goods_img_code ,gi.goods_img ,row_number() OVER() FROM tb_goods AS g JOIN tb_goods_img AS gi ON g.goods_code = gi.goods_code WHERE g.goods_code = #{goodsCode};

SELECT g.goods_code ,g.goods_name ,g.goods_category_code ,g.user_id ,g.goods_rental_availability ,g.goods_value_price ,g.goods_purchase_date ,g.goods_day_price ,g.goods_detail ,g.goods_reg_date ,gc.goods_category_name , CONCAT(rsido.region_sido_name,' ',rsgg.region_sgg_name) as user_region , u.user_nickname ,f.file_path FROM tb_goods AS g join tb_region_sgg AS rsgg ON rsgg.region_sgg_code = g.region_sgg_code join tb_region_sido AS rsido on rsgg.region_sido_code = rsido.region_sido_code join tb_goods_category AS gc on gc.goods_category_code = g.goods_category_code JOIN tb_user AS u ON u.user_id = g.user_id JOIN tb_file_group AS fg ON g.file_group_code = fg.file_group_code JOIN tb_file AS f ON f.file_code = fg.file_code WHERE g.goods_code = #{goodsCode};
